description: If you have a personal computer, you have probably already used the software for word processing, to solve problems, or set up spreadsheets. We thought maybe you would be curious about how programmers write the software you have used. Computer programming is a set of rules that tell a computer what operations the user needs it to perform, this is a programming language. There are many computer languages and they are listed in this ebook. If you want to learn more about what a programmer does, places to learn about programming, programming definitions, and jobs you can get as a programmer then this ebook is for you. Download a better understanding for computer programming today!
